content: विचारः {@--1@} Reflection, deliberation, thought, consideration; विचारमार्गप्रहितेन चक्षुषा <ls>Ku. 5. 42.</ls> {@--2@} Examination, discussion, investigation; तत्वार्थविचार. {@--3@} Trial, (of a case); विषसलिलतुलाग्निप्रार्थिते मे विचारे <ls>Mk. 9. 43.</ls> {@--4@} Judgment, discrimination, discernment, exercise of reason; विचारमूढः प्रतिभासि मे त्वं <ls>R. 2. 47.</ls> {@--5@} Decision, determination. {@--6@} Selection. {@--7@} Doubt, hesitation. {@--8@} Prudence, circumspection.
